response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its exceptional quality and features, it's worth more than $150 to us. Considering its value and what it can offer you, I propose a price of $120 for this product. This is a special offer tailored to discerning buyers like yourself. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at an attractive price.", "product_price": 120}
